title: The Shroud of Turin: 3.4. The man on the Shroud and Jesus were beaten
post: To all my readers. If you like this my The Shroud of Turin  blog, and you have a website, could you please consider adding  a hyperlink to my blog on it? This would help increase my blog's Google PageRank number and enable more people who are Google searching on "the Shroud of Turin" to discover my blog. Thanks. Stephen E. Jones
author: Stephen E Jones

title: The Shroud of Turin: 3.4. The man on the Shroud and Jesus were beaten
